data.name: Lost Paws
data.detailed_description:
Experience the world as a stray dog! Jump, dig, bark, and bonk your way through human society and wilderness to survive. Customize your appearance with various items and even acquire special skills and abilities that change the way you play the game. You decide what kind of dog you’ll be!

Become a good doggo


Or become a bad doggo


Choose the type of doggo you want to be!


Lost Paws features:
  • Live the life of a stray dog
  • Survive in a vast open world
  • Gain wacky dog skills throughout the game
  • Encounter a wide variety of different humans
  • Customize your dog with all sorts of acquirable hats and items
  • Bonk all kinds of people and items with physics
  • Utilize an RPG system to choose your style of play
  • Go on various special missions
  • Transcend beyond just a mere doggo

Whether you want to scavenge for food in a forest, or try your paws at raiding super stores, or something else entirely, you get to decide what sort of doggo you’ll become. Let your personal story be written by your actions and adventures, but maybe with some cool glasses too!

data.short_description: Play as a stray dog in an open world survival game! Run, jump, dig, and bonk your way through a vast city and its surrounding areas. Make new friends and learn new abilities as you build a home for yourself. How you play determines how the world will play with you. What kind of stray will you be?
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1400 quad-core or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 1600 Hexa-core or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Sound Card

content_descriptors.notes: Contains cartoon violence and crude humor
